edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.activecode.prototype.interfaces

Interface Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActiveNonBlockingClient

    public interface Client
    Author:
    gaozy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValuesMap runCode(InternalRequestHeader header, String guid, String field, String code, ValuesMap valuesMap, int ttl, long budget)
      The handler only call this client interface to let the client process a request.
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown this client when system stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • runCode

        ValuesMap runCode(InternalRequestHeader header,
                  String guid,
                  String field,
                  String code,
                  ValuesMap valuesMap,
                  int ttl,
                  long budget)
           throws ActiveException
        The handler only call this client interface to let the client process a request. All I/O and messaging are hidden to handler. This method needs to handle the communication between GNS and worker.

        An ActiveException should be thrown by this method if the request failed as indicated by the response message, or communication channel is broken.

        Parameters:
        header -
        guid -
        field -
        code -
        valuesMap -
        ttl -
        budget -
        Returns:
        the executed result as an ValuesMap object
        Throws:
        ActiveException

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown this client when system stopped.
